appTransition.header: GuideSafe has a new look and feel
appTransition.body1: If you used GuideSafe prior to January 2021, this app will look and feel new to you.
appTransition.body2: Don't worry: any exposure information on your device has not been affected. We hope you enjoy this new version of GuideSafe.
